author: Mesfin Teklu Tessema
title: Here is What Working the Ebola Frontline Taught Us About Fighting the Coronavirus Pandemic | Opinion
description: The two viruses are nowhere similar—but the fight against ebola holds valuable insights for the fight we're in today, and the fights to come.
content:
Four months that's the time it has taken for the coronavirus known as COVID 19 to become a global pandemic, change the face of global health and disrupt the daily lives of people around the world.
